sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    .form
        .wrapper
            form.form-questions
                h2.form-questions__title We will answer your questions!
                .fieldset.fieldset-name(:class="{'has-error': !nameValid}")
                    v-input(lightColor = true v-model="name", :label="formFirstName" :isValid="nameValid" :type="'text'", :name="'name'" @keyup="nameValid = true" @click="nameValid = true" @mouseover="nameValid = true")
                .fieldset.fieldset-message(:class="{'has-error': !messageValid}")
                    v-textarea(:minHeight="22" lightColor = true v-model="message" :label="formMessage" :isValid="messageValid" :name="'message'" @value="checkMessage" @keyup="messageValid = true" @click="messageValid = true" @mouseover="messageValid = true")
                .fieldset.fieldset-email(:class="{'has-error': !nameValid}")
                    v-input(lightColor = true v-model="email", :label="formEmail" :isValid="emailValid" :type="'email'", :name="'email'" @keyup="emailValid = true" @click="emailValid = true" @mouseover="emailValid = true")
                button(type="button" name="submit" @click="onSubmit()")
                    span Send
                widget(static = true)

</template>

<script>
    import vInput from '../../components/input';
    import vTextarea from '../../components/textarea';
    import Widget from '../includes/widget/widget.vue';

    export default {
        name: 'Form',
        data: function(){
            return {
                modalVisible: false,
                textareaAutosize: '',
                formFirstName: "Name",
                formEmail: "E-mail",
                formMessage: "Your message",
                name: '',
                email: '',
                message: '',
                nameValid: true,
                emailValid: true,
                messageValid: true,
                thanksMessage: false,
            }
        },
        components: {
            'v-input': vInput,
            'v-textarea': vTextarea,
            'widget': Widget
        },
        methods: {
            checkMessage(val){
                this.message = val;
                if(val.length > 0) {
                    this.messageValid = true;
                }
            },
            isEmailValid(email) {
                let re = /^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;
                return re.test(String(email).toLowerCase());
            },
            onSubmit(){
                let isValid = true,
                    formData = new FormData;

                if(!this.name) {
                    this.nameValid = false;
                    isValid= false;
                } else {
                    this.nameValid = true;
				    formData.append('name', this.name);
                }

                if(this.isEmailValid(this.email)) {
                    this.emailValid = true;
                    formData.append('email', this.email);
                } else {
                    this.emailValid = false;
                    isValid = false;
                }

                if(!this.message) {
                    this.messageValid = false;
                    isValid = false;
                } else {
                    this.messageValid = true;
				    formData.append('message', this.message);
                }

                if (!isValid) return;
			
			    this.onSuccess();
            },
            onSuccess(){
                this.thanksMessage = true;
                setTimeout(() => {
                    this.thanksMessage = false;
                    this.modalVisible = false;
                }, 2000);
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .form {
        padding-bottom: 97px;
    }

    .form-questions {
        background: linear-gradient(139.69deg, #357FDB -29.91%, #60D0E9 97.64%);
        border-radius: 6px;
        padding: 48px 0 57px 110px;
        color: #fff;
        overflow: hidden;
        position: relative;

        &__title {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Bold';
            font-size: 40px;
            line-height: 46px;
            max-width: 534px;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            letter-spacing: -1px;
        }

        .fieldset {
            &-name {
                width: 100%;
                max-width: 290px;
                display: inline-block;
                margin-right: 36px;
            }

            &-email {
                width: 100%;
                max-width: 290px;
                margin-bottom: 32px;
            }

            &-message {
                width: 100%;
                max-width: 290px;
                display: inline-block;
                position: relative;
                top: 6px;
            }
        }

        button[type="button"] {
            width: 139px;
            height: 40px;
            background: #fff;
            border-radius: 100px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Regular';
            font-size: 11px;
            line-height: 19px;
            text-align: center;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            color: #37393E;
            cursor: pointer;
            position: relative;
            transition: .3s all ease;

            span {
                position: relative;
                z-index: 2;
            }

            &:after {
                content: '';
                position: absolute;
                top: 0;
                left: 0;
                width: 100%;
                height: 100%;
                border-radius: 100px;
                background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85)), linear-gradient(189.87deg, #357FDB -14.01%, #2361AA 109.14%);
                transition: .3s all ease;
                opacity: 0;
            }

            &:hover:after {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
    }

    .widget {
        width: 60%;
        height: 100%;
        position: absolute;
        z-index: 0;
        right: -16%;
        top: 0;

        &__wrapper {
            transform: scale(0.82) !important;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 1200px) {
        .form-questions {
            padding: 48px 0 57px 50px;
        }
    }
</style>
